landscape_overview.title: Patent Landscape Overview

sections.label: Core Patent Coverage
sections.value: Composition of matter, peptide formulation, oral absorption enhancers

sections.label: Patent Expiry Timeline
sections.value: Core molecule expiry ~2028; formulation & dosing extend to 2032+

sections.label: Freedom To Operate (FTO)
sections.value: Moderate risk post-2028 due to method-of-use patents

landscape_overview.description: Semaglutide's IP estate is optimized for lifecycle extension via formulation, dosing regimens, and indication-specific claims.

repurposing_strategy.title: Strategic Repurposing Patent Strategy
repurposing_strategy.high_confidence_targets: Cardiovascular risk reduction and metabolic liver disease present strong opportunities for method-of-treatment claims independent of glycemic control.
repurposing_strategy.medium_risk_areas: Neurodegenerative and addiction-related indications require precise claim construction around neuro-inflammatory and reward-pathway modulation.

filing_heatmap.title: Competitive Filing Heatmap
filing_heatmap.description: Filing density indicates strong defensive coverage in US/EU markets, with whitespace opportunities in emerging economies post-expiry.

key_patent_extract.title: Key Patent Extract (High Risk)
key_patent_extract.description: Methods for administering semaglutide at extended dosing intervals to achieve sustained metabolic control.
key_patent_extract.risk_note: Potential overlap with alternate dosing strategies for neuropsychiatric or addiction-related indications.

ip_opportunities.title: Forward-Looking IP Opportunities
ip_opportunities.high_value_claims: Cardiovascular outcomes, neuro-inflammation modulation, metabolic liver disease
ip_opportunities.note: Strategic focus on indication-specific method claims enables durable exclusivity beyond core molecule expiry.

aud_focus.title: Alcohol Use Disorder (AUD) – Patent Focus

sections.label: Relevant Existing Patents
sections.value: US10765789 (extended dosing), formulation and delivery patents

sections.label: AUD Method-of-Use Coverage
sections.value: No explicit AUD claims filed – indication-level whitespace remains

sections.label: AUD FTO Assessment
sections.value: Moderate risk due to dosing-interval overlap; manageable via behavioral endpoint differentiation

aud_focus.description: AUD represents a filtered, high-value subset of the broader IP estate, with defensible method-of-treatment claims possible without challenging core composition patents.
